column1: The '''Host of the North''' was [[Morgoth]]'s army during [[War of Wrath|The War of Wrath]]. The army was comprised of [[Orcs]]
column3: and [[Dragons]] (led by [[Ancalagon|Ancalagon the Black]]). Most of the army was destroyed at the end of the [[First Age]] by the [[Host of the West]].<ref>{{S|Earendil}}</ref> Some of the survivors eventually fell under [[Sauron|Sauron's]] influence and helped bring about the [[Dark Years]].
